transcript: Well, no, I mean, I don't carry my original documents with me because if those things get destroyed, then what do you know what I mean? Like, if I lose my wallet or something, I'll never have them again.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well, no.  I mean, I don't carry my original documents with me because if those things get destroyed, then what do you, you know what I mean, like if I loose my wallet or something, I'll never have them again.
